short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage custom prompts for Claude AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Claude AI Prompt Manager allows users to create, organize, and quickly access custom prompts within the Claude AI interface. 

It supports prompt and category management, a responsive sidepanel, local storage, and cross-browser compatibility, making your Claude AI experience more efficient and organized.

How to Use Claude AI Prompt Manager:

Create Prompts:

- Open the extension by clicking the Claude AI Prompt Manager icon in the Claude AI interface.
- Add a new prompt by entering a title, content, and selecting a category.
- Save the prompt for quick access later.

Access Prompts:

- Click the blue plus (+) icon/button in the prompt area.
- Browse through your saved prompts.
- Select a prompt and insert it directly into the Claude AI chat input.


Coming Soon:
- Personalize the extension with your own categories and color schemes.
- Save and run a series of prompts as a prompt chain, executing them one by one with a single click.
